channel.title: Intro on Bre's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Intro on Bre's blog

item.title: Bar Plot
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) Homerun Distribution by Team in 1980 query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR" result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=result,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat='identity',color="blue",fill="white")+ coord_flip()+ ylab("homeruns")+ xlab("teams")+ ggtitle("1980 Team Homerun Distribution")

item.title: Time Series
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) Babe Ruth’s homeruns during his career query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homeruns Totals Throughout the Years")+ xlab("year")+ ylab("homeruns")

item.title: Welcome to Data Science
item.description: Welcome to Breonna’s blog! This blog will be information and examples that are provided in Dr. Redmond’s Intro to Data Science class at Mercyhurst University. The examples for the earlier work with SQL are done on my other website…. https://bbaile99.github.io/website/
